entities.description: Violations related to the use or possession of gambling equipment.
Tampering with sports events or activities.
Engaging in or offering sexual services for money.
The act of assisting or promoting prostitution.
The act of purchasing or soliciting prostitution.
The act of giving or receiving bribes.
Violations of laws regulating weapons.
Commercial sex acts that involve human trafficking.
The willful killing of one human being by another without negligence.
The killing of another person through gross negligence.
The killing of a person under circumstances that allow the act to be regarded as not culpable.
The unlawful seizure and carrying away of a person by force or fraud.
The unlawful sexual activity typically involving sexual intercourse done forcibly or under threat of injury.
Sexual acts involving the anus, especially between two men.
Sexual assault involving an object.
Indecent liberties or child molestation involving fondling.
The taking or attempt to take anything of value by force or threat of force.
An attack by one person upon another for the purpose of inflicting severe or aggravated bodily injury.
An unlawful attack by one person upon another.
Putting someone in fear through threats or coercion.
The willful or malicious burning of property.
The obtainment of money, property, or favors by force or threat.
The unlawful entry of a structure to commit a felony or theft.
The theft of money or other goods out of the pockets or purse of a person.

relationships.description: Indicates that purchasing prostitution is related to the act of prostitution.
Indicates that prostitution is promoted by specific actions.
Specifies that human trafficking can involve commercial sex acts.
Indicates that murder or nonnegligent manslaughter is considered a violent crime.
Indicates that simple assault falls under assault crimes.
Specifies that rape is classified as a sexual offense.
Specifies that burglary or breaking and entering is a type of property crime.
Indicates that robbery can involve intimidation.
